Function reference

Piping functions

galah_call() request_data() request_metadata() request_files()
Start building a query
collapse(<data_request>) collapse(<metadata_request>) collapse(<files_request>)
Generate a query
compute(<data_request>) compute(<metadata_request>) compute(<files_request>) compute(<query_set>) compute(<query>)
Compute a query
collect(<data_request>) collect(<metadata_request>) collect(<files_request>) collect(<query_set>) collect(<query>)
Retrieve a database query
print(<data_request>) print(<files_request>) print(<metadata_request>) print(<query>) print(<query_set>) print(<galah_config>)
Print galah objects

Look up information

show_all() show_all_apis() show_all_assertions() show_all_atlases() show_all_collections() show_all_datasets() show_all_fields() show_all_licences() show_all_lists() show_all_profiles() show_all_providers() show_all_ranks() show_all_reasons()
Show valid record information
search_all() search_assertions() search_apis() search_atlases() search_collections() search_datasets() search_fields() search_identifiers() search_licences() search_lists() search_profiles() search_providers() search_ranks() search_reasons() search_taxa()
Search for record information
show_values() search_values()
Show or search for values within a specified field

Lazy data manipulation

galah_identify() identify(<data_request>) identify(<metadata_request>)
Narrow a query by passing taxonomic identifiers
galah_filter() filter(<data_request>) filter(<metadata_request>) filter(<files_request>)
Narrow a query by specifying filters
galah_select() select(<data_request>)
Specify fields for occurrence download
galah_group_by() group_by(<data_request>)
Specify fields to group when downloading record counts
galah_bbox() galah_geolocate() galah_polygon() st_crop(<data_request>)
Narrow a query to within a specified area
galah_apply_profile() apply_profile()
Apply a data quality profile
galah_down_to()
Deprecated functions
arrange(<data_request>) arrange(<metadata_request>)
Arrange rows of a query
desc() unnest()
Non-generic tidyverse functions
slice_head(<data_request>) slice_head(<metadata_request>)
Subset first rows of data_request
reexports arrange collect compute collapse identify filter select group_by slice_head count st_crop
Objects exported from other packages

Download data

atlas_occurrences()
Collect a set of occurrences
atlas_counts() count(<data_request>)
Return a count of records
atlas_species()
Collect the set of species observed within the specified filters
atlas_taxonomy()
Search taxonomic trees
atlas_media()
Get metadata on images, sounds and videos
collect_media()
Collect media files
collapse(<data_request>) collapse(<metadata_request>) collapse(<files_request>)
Generate a query

Configure session

galah_config()
Get or set configuration options that control galah behaviour

Cite

atlas_citation()
Generate a citation for occurrence data
